home.introDescription: Today we are the only company in the Kazakhstani agricultural market, which for more than 20 years proudly presents the best equipment from world leaders, such as:

digitsSection.yearsAsJohnDeereDealer: years as a national John Deere dealer
digitsSection.partsWarehousesValue: parts warehouses worth more than $16 million
digitsSection.representationsInKazakhstanAndKyrgyzstan: representations in Kazakhstan and 1 in Kyrgyzstan
digitsSection.marketShareInPremiumSegment: market share in the Premium segment

solutionsSection.title: Unique Solutions
solutionsSection.subtitle: Over the years, we have created a developed network to provide farmers with unique comprehensive solutions in the agriculture of Kazakhstan and Kyrgyzstan

flexboxItems.subtitle: million hectares are sown with John Deere seeding solutions
million hectares digitized with John Deere solutions
million hectares harvested with John Deere harvesting solutions
thousand hectares irrigated with irrigation solutions

ourMission.introDescription: We feed the world by helping farmers adopt and apply innovative solutions to develop agriculture and produce the highest quality products possible

hungerForSuccess.title: Hunger for Success
hungerForSuccess.description: We are always ambitious, passionate, and energetic in our dreams and achievements

love.title: Love
love.description: Love is the foundation on which we build our business, relationships within the team, with clients, and partners

team.title: Team
team.description: We are highly motivated professionals, experts, and consultants, always ready to help and provide support

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Innovation is an integral part of our lives, and the boundlessness in the growth and development of everything that surrounds us makes us unique

mindfulness.title: Mindfulness
mindfulness.description: We clearly know what we want in life, why we came to our company, and what is necessary for our beloved clients and partners

wellBeing.title: Well-being
wellBeing.description: We constantly work to increase the profits of our clients, partners, employees, and shareholders. Partnership with us is a mutually beneficial cooperation that leads to the growth of well-being for all parties

synergy.title: Synergy
synergy.description: Our life goals and values align with the goals and values of our company
